com.flowpowered.cerealization.config.commented

Class CommentedConfigurationNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.cerealization.config.AbstractConfigurationNodeSource
      • com.flowpowered.cerealization.config.ConfigurationNode
        • com.flowpowered.cerealization.config.commented.CommentedConfigurationNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationNodeSource, ValueHolder

    public class CommentedConfigurationNode
extends ConfigurationNode
    A ConfigurationNode type that also stores comments. These normally exist in CommentedConfigurations.

        public String[] getComment()

      • setComment

        public void setComment(String comment)
        Sets the comment that is attached to this configuration node. In this method the comment is provided as one line, containing the line separator character
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to set
